attributes.action: Stop all armaments exports to Israel
attributes.additional_details: We call for a total blockade of exports of weapons or part of weapons/armaments to the Israeli government.
attributes.background: We think there should be a complete blockade of UK exports of armaments or part of armaments to Israel.

other_parliamentary_business.body:
The text of this petition has been amended, to ensure it meets the petition standards. 
If you'd like to remove your signature, please email petitionscommittee@parliament.uk
other_parliamentary_business.subject: Change to petition text
